styles p: jah be like a long cloth to my feet guide and protect me when things get deep even though the streets full of heat still i gotta make ends meet jah be like a long cloth to my feet guide and protect me when things get deep i pray that my soul you keep cause me wa fi to dwell where the angels sleep

life is getting way too deep when i die i wanna go where the angels sleep yeah im outside trying to make ends meet my mens ten deep in a range or benz jeep room 2 niggersll shoot you its crucial aint marley marl but im part of the juice crew brass in the bark of the dutch and the deuce deuce spit on a nuke to get loot im the shit lou shit is a dog like pitbull a shih tzu right arm up in a fist getting clenched too give them an inch and them niggers will take a mile    father they style and them niggers will try to style on you but not me nigga amma cafie nigga cant pop me nigga i always come with a good plan and if that dont work i switch out to the hood plan

god is protection x is intersection trunk full of weight in the chevy holding the wesson fire will burn but we never would learn a lesson till the cell door close move more keys and we sell more oz and bag more grams we aint wanna be criminals we had more plans but it aint pan out its rocks in this pot that i gotta hand out as soon as they fan out thats the old days this the new days now its salvia kush lemon and poo day high def wi-fi clear as blu-ray but im still old school like the hanging antenna you could play with the fan or bang your bandana s.p the ghost or s.p the most lyrical motherfucker in the game no jokes .45 will leave your ass hight no smoke
